grampg's documentation
======================

.. module:: grampg
   :platform: Unix, Windows
   :synopsis: Simple and flexible password generation library.
.. moduleauthor:: Elvio Toccalino <elviotoccalino@yahoo.com>


Password generation with a fluent interface... a nice treat when you're under supervision of a grumpy sysadmin.
